establishment.founding_vision: To establish a model educational institution demonstrating modern pedagogical practices and multipurpose education combining academic excellence with vocational training

Ministry of Education, Science and Technology

subjects: Compulsory: Nepali, English, Mathematics, Science, Social Studies

Bio breaks are mandatory for student health and hygiene

adarsha_ai_assistant.purpose: Interactive AI-powered information system for Adarsha Secondary School

ai_capabilities: Natural language understanding in English and Nepali

exhibition_2082.purpose: To demonstrate practical application of theoretical knowledge through hands-on projects

mathematics.subject: Mathematics
mathematics.title: Comparison of Volume and Surface Area in Solid Objects
objectives: To understand the relationship between volume and surface area
To derive formulas for cone and cylinder
To analyze the effect of combining solid figures

formulas_applied.cone_surface_area: TSA = πr(r + l) where l = √(r² + h²)

key_findings: Total volume remains constant whether figures are separate or combined
Combined figure has less surface area by exactly 2πr² due to loss of joining circular faces
Demonstrates conservation principle in volume but not in surface area
learning_outcomes: Application of mathematical formulas in real objects

science.subject: Science
science.title: Conservation of Environment with Utilization of Water
objectives: To show water cycle and conservation

stage_1.process: Factory simulation using incense to create visible smoke

stage_2.process: Smoke absorption through fan into carbon absorber box

stage_3.process: Humidifier creates moisture in closed system

stage_5.output: LED lights powered by generated electricity

environmental_message.primary: Integration of pollution control with resource utilization
secondary: Water is a renewable but precious resource
Environmental conservation and development can coexist

innovation_aspects: Multi-stage environmental process in single model

english.subject: English
english.title: Parts of Speech - The Building Blocks of Language
objectives: To show relationships between parts of speech

parts_of_speech.name: Noun
parts_of_speech.definition: A word that names a person, place, thing, or idea
parts_of_speech.family_role: The Foundation - Head of the family

parts_of_speech.name: Pronoun
parts_of_speech.definition: A word that replaces a noun

parts_of_speech.name: Verb
parts_of_speech.definition: A word that shows action or state of being
parts_of_speech.family_role: The Action Hero - Makes things happen

parts_of_speech.name: Adverb
parts_of_speech.definition: A word that modifies a verb, adjective, or another adverb
parts_of_speech.family_role: The Modifier - Adds detail to actions

parts_of_speech.name: Adjective
parts_of_speech.definition: A word that describes or modifies a noun
parts_of_speech.family_role: The Describer - Adds color to nouns

parts_of_speech.name: Preposition
parts_of_speech.definition: A word that shows relationship between nouns/pronouns and other words

parts_of_speech.name: Conjunction
parts_of_speech.definition: A word that joins words, phrases, or clauses

sentence_building_board.description: Magnetic board where visitors create sentences

grammar_wheel.activity: Spin and create sentences with selected part of speech

sample_sentences.sentence: The brilliant students quickly understood the complex grammar.

social_studies.project_type: Cultural Heritage Display with Historical Context

model_created.details: Complete with prayer flags and eyes

dome_style.historical_period: Ancient period, renovated in different eras

jana_andolan_2062_063.title: People's Movement II
architectural_impact: Preservation of cultural sites as national identity
Conversion of royal palaces to museums

categories.name: नाम (Naam)
categories.definition: व्यक्ति, वस्तु, स्थान वा भावको नाम

computer_engineering_program.description: Our flagship program providing comprehensive technical education in computer engineering

certification.grade_12: Higher Secondary Completion Certificate + Technical Certification

computer_science.description: Advanced computer science program focusing on programming, algorithms, and software development

facilities.computer_science_lab: Advanced programming lab with latest software and development tools

management.description: Comprehensive business management program covering economics, accounting, marketing, and entrepreneurship

historical_background.founding: Established in 2024 B.S. as Demonstration Multi-Purpose School (DMPS)

key_milestones.event: Started with grade 6, 30 students as DMPS
First SLC with 17 students (16 passed with distinction)
25 students in SLC with improved results
Started technical education (Computer Engineering) in grade 9

infrastructure.location: Environmentally friendly area in Sanothimi, Bhaktapur

achievements.technical_education: Pioneer in computer engineering education at school level
achievements.community_engagement: Active participation in community development programs

exhibition_queries.response: We are currently hosting our Friday Academic Exhibition featuring 5 major projects from different subjects. Would you like to know about specific projects in Mathematics, Science, English, Social Studies, or Nepali?

Our Mathematics project demonstrates the comparison of volume and surface area in solid objects. Students have created separate and combined models of cones and cylinders to show that while total volume remains constant, surface area changes by 2πr² when figures are combined.

The Science project showcases environmental conservation with water utilization. It's a working model that simulates air purification, cloud formation, rainfall, and hydroelectric generation - demonstrating how we can integrate pollution control with resource utilization.

We offer a comprehensive 4-year Computer Engineering program from Grade 9 to 12. This flagship technical education program covers programming, hardware, networking, and software development with fully equipped computer labs and industry-relevant curriculum.

general_queries.response: Adarsha Secondary School was established on 29 Jestha, 2024 B.S. (June 11, 1967 AD) as Demonstration Multipurpose School (DMPS). We have been providing quality education for over 50 years.
Currently we have 1371 students from ECD to Grade 12, with 745 male and 626 female students. Our technical stream in Computer Engineering has 48 students in Grade 9C.

We have excellent infrastructure including 2 computer labs, science laboratories, a library with 5000+ books, spacious playground, and well-equipped classrooms. Our technical facilities support our Computer Engineering program from Grade 9-12.
